content: <CoRIS>  <Local-number>Ishoda2010 </Local-number>  <Author>Ishoda, A., Hess, D., Jacobson, D., Beger, M., Richards, Z., Kabua, E., Guavis, C., White, M., Muller, H., Yamamura, B., Emslie, M., Hobbs, J.-P. </Author>  <Title>Majuro Atoll long-term monitoring guide. Coral reef communities and marine debris </Title>  <Institution>Australian Museum, College of the Marshall Islands, and University of Queensland </Institution>  <Publication-Date><caldate>2010 </caldate></Publication-Date>  <Extent>60 </Extent>  <Notes>FY2009 CRCP Project ID 1106, Old Project ID 20251; Project Title: National Coral Reef Ecosystem Monitoring Program (Grant); Principal Investigator: Mark Monaco. NOAA FY2009 grant NA09NOS4260098 </Notes>  <URL-Cover>http://data.nodc.noaa.gov/coris/library/NOAA/CRCP/other/grants/MonitoringGrants_FY09_Products/Majuro_Monit_Guide_NA09NOS4260098_Cover_Page_01.jpg </URL-Cover>  <grantid>  <id>NA09NOS4260098 </id>  </grantid>  <Abstract>This training manual briefly explains the importance of monitoring which enables successful conservation actions by observing and recording change to the coral reef resources around the Majuro Atoll. Survey methods and designs are succinctly described and illustrated. Includes a coral identification guide. </Abstract>  <Keywords>Majuro Atoll Long-term Monitoring Program </Keywords>  <Date-Time-Last-Modified>20140627000000 </Date-Time-Last-Modified>  <URL>http://data.nodc.noaa.gov/coris/library/NOAA/CRCP/other/grants/MonitoringGrants_FY09_Products/Majuro_Monit_Guide_NA09NOS4260098.pdf </URL>  <project>  <ID>1106 </ID>  <title>National Coral Reef Ecosystem Monitoring Program (Grant) </title>  <PI>Mark Monaco </PI>  </project>  <Region>RMI </Region>  <Bounding>  <Eastbc>169.97 </Eastbc>  <Westbc>162.302 </Westbc>  <Southbc>5.573 </Southbc>  <Northbc>14.71 </Northbc>  </Bounding>  <CoRIS-Record-Type>techreport </CoRIS-Record-Type>  <Local-subject-index>Grants </Local-subject-index>  <Local-subject-index>techreport </Local-subject-index>  <Local-subject-index>publication </Local-subject-index>  <resdesc>CoRIS Bibliographic </resdesc> </CoRIS>
